description: Try our easy to follow Lasagne Marinara recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lasagne Marinara Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 405g can diced Italian tomatoes with basil garlic and onion, Garlic and Onion

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease the base of a 20x20cm ceramic lasagne dish.

Melt butter in a saucepan over a medium heat. Add flour, stirring continuously, until mixture is bubbly. Remove saucepan from heat and slowly add milk, whisking until smooth. Return to heat. Stir constantly until sauce comes to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 2 minutes. Remove from heat and cover surface of sauce with plastic wrap.
Heat oil in a non-stick frying pan over a medium-high heat. Add onion and cook for 3 minutes until soft. Add diced tomatoes, lemon rind and juice. Cook for 2 minutes. Add marinara, remove from heat.

Spread 1 cup of seafood mixture over base of baking dish. Cover with 3 lasagne sheets. Top with 2 cups of seafood mixture, 1/3 cup of white sauce and a further 3 lasagne sheets. Pour remaining seafood mixture over, another 1/3 white sauce and remaining lasagne sheets. Spread remaining white sauce over and sprinkle with parmesan. Bake for 30 minutes. Stand for 10 minutes before cutting.
